In this episode we (Lily Kyle and I, STEPS scholars) interviewed [Dr. Deanna Osmond](https://cals.ncsu.edu/crop-and-soil-sciences/people/dosmond/), professor at North Carolina State University. We discussed the challenges of phosphorus sustainability in agricultural systems and we revisited her career.
